errors.error_description: The 'Hello World' example code is logically incorrect. The handler function uses a string literal on its own line instead of a 'return' statement, so the bot will not send any message.
correction_candidates: async def handler(_) -> str: return "Hello world!"
async def handler(message): await message.answer("Hello world!")
errors.golden_answer: async def handler(_) -> str: return "Hello world!"
